function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in classrooms","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission among students and staff","Mitigation":"Implementing smaller class sizes or hybrid learning models, enforcing mask-wearing and social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Scheduling software for managing class sizes, contact tracing apps for identifying potential exposures","People":"Students, faculty, staff","Owner":"School administrators, faculty"},{"Description":"Shared patrol car assignments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among police officers","Mitigation":"Assigning separate patrol cars for each officer, implementing regular decontamination procedures for vehicles","Technologies":"Vehicle tracking and scheduling software, vehicle disinfection equipment","People":"Police officers, campus security staff","Owner":"Campus security department, facility management"},{"Description":"Potential exposure to communicable diseases","Impact":"Risk of infection among first responders","Mitigation":"Enhancing decontamination procedures, providing personal protective equipment (PPE) to first responders, training on disease precautions","Technologies":"Decontamination equipment, PPE supplies, training simulations","People":"First responders, emergency personnel","Owner":"Emergency management department, public health authorities"}]}
